channel.title: features on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in features on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-14
item.description: The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience' Hits PS5 and Xbox Series X/S (1 minute read) Epic Games has released The Matrix Awakens: An Unreal Engine 5 Experience, a tech demo with ultra-realistic visuals and open-world environments.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-14
item.description: Facebook execs tease VR prototype hardware with new photos (2 minute read) Mark Zuckerberg and Andrew Bosworth recently posted pictures of themselves wearing prototype headsets and linking the concepts to Facebook’s work on the metaverse.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-28
item.description: Tesla Model S refreshed with a radically redesigned interior and 520-mile range (3 minute read) Tesla has unveiled its long-rumored refresh for its Model S sedan.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-16
item.description: Hereâ€™s everything Apple just announced (9 minute read) Apple has announced a new virtual fitness service, a subscription service called Apple One, and a new lineup of Apple Watches and iPads.
